title: Data Selection in Pandas
description: In this lab, we are going to learn how to select specific data from a DataFrame using Pandas, a popular data analysis and manipulation library in Python. We will use the Titanic dataset for this tutorial.

meta.title: Mastering Data Selection in Pandas
meta.description: Learn how to effectively select data from a DataFrame using Pandas, a powerful data analysis library.
meta.keywords: Pandas, data selection, DataFrame, data analysis, Python
